site.name: Tidal Wrap
site.tagline: Corrosion Protection for Marine Steel Pipes

intro.title: Splash Zone Protection
intro.body: The PCS anticorrosive protection system provides splash zone protection for steel structures, concrete and wood.

intro.title: Ideal for Marine Environments
intro.body: The PCS system is ideal for environments where conditions are too severe for paint systems, epoxies and other conventional forms of protection.

intro.title: Stop Corrosion on Metal Surfaces
intro.body: The PCS system seals the oxygen and water and effectively stops corrosion on metal surfaces.

intro.title: Prevents Further Corrosion
intro.body: The system also prevents loosening and corrosion of steel reinforcement in concrete piles. The PCS system encapsulates pier piles, riser tubes and pipes exposed in intertidal zones and splash.

intro.title: Various Configurations
intro.body: The system accommodates cylindrical piles and H configurations and support members, reinforcement, supports and other uneven surfaces.

system.title: PCS Primer
system.body: Petrolatum-based primer for use on metal surfaces prior to wrapping with Anti corrosion Petro Tape.

system.title: PCS Mastic
system.body: Petrolatum Mastic is used to fill cavities based on uneven surfaces before wrapping PCS Anti corrosion tape.

system.title: PCS Liner 6000
system.body: The PCÂ® 6000HD series consists of a proprietary polymer polyolefin, fully protected against UV degradation and oxidation with technically advanced stabilization package.

system.title: Petro Tape
system.body: Synthetic adhesive fabric impregnated and coated with a material based on waxes and oils, covered with vaseline-based compounds and inert fibers.

characteristics.title: Characteristics & Advantages
body: Since its first introduction in 1929 petrolatum tapes have established an enviable record of performance and unparalleled asset protection in a number of environments.
Mechanical protection also covers Liner 6000 PCL have stood the test of time in atmospheric environments and aggressive chemicals (30 years +).
items: Tested by more than 75-year history of corrosion protection
Resistance to water, salts, alkalis and acids
Application for new installations as corroded
High impact shock resistance and tides.
Environmentally responsible and safe to use

pcs.title: Prevents Corrosion
pcs.body: PCS products are designed to stop and prevent corrosion in pipes, valves, piles, fittings and flanges in the most extreme environments imaginable.

pcs.title: Various Applications
pcs.body: PCS products are used successfully in a variety of applications in oil & gas, pulp & paper, municipal and wastewater industries and routine building maintenance.

pcs.title: A Leading Manufacturer
pcs.body: PCS is one of the leading manufacturers of anticorrosion tape systems petrolatum, exporting to many countries throughout the world.

pcs.title: North American
pcs.body: Located in Toronto, Canada PCS is one of the most efficient in their field and have the latest manufacturing equipment.
